properties.name: 1035 S Waterford Drive
properties.address_full: 1035 South Waterford Drive, Florissant, MO, USA
properties.marketing_message: Welcome home to 1035 South Waterford Drive in desirable Florissant! This updated and inviting 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers comfortable living in a fantastic location. Enjoy 984 square feet of freshly updated space, perfect for everyday living. Features include central AC to keep you cool, a covered porch for relaxing outdoors, and a large backyard ideal for entertaining. You'll also find convenient laundry hookups, a refrigerator, and a stove & oven. Parking is a breeze with off-street parking and a tuck-under garage. This home offers a full, unfinished basement with tons of potential. Easy access to shopping and highways, making your commute and errands a breeze. Pets are welcome with a pet fee and additional pet rent. Don't miss out on this great place to call home!
properties.marketing_parking: Off Street Parking, Tuck Under Garage
properties.marketing_amenities: Central AC, Covered Porch, Large Back Yard, Laundry Hookups, Refrigerator, Stove & Oven
properties.marketing_pets_policy: Pets allowed with pet fee and additional pet rent.
